response.original_title: マルチの話をさっきまで得意げにしてたのに「購入するからヤらせて」って言われたらそんな顔するんですね 天使もえ チェキ付き
response.overview: he hero of the story has been chatting with a pretty woman through a dating app and finally meets her in person, harboring high expectations that she might be “the one.”  However, during their date, this woman unexpectedly introduces a marketing scheme offer, leaving the man dumbfounded and feeling like he has wasted his time, prompting him to seek revenge.  He responds by saying he will enroll in her schemes and sign a contract if she consents to have sex with him.  Moe plays along with the charade, even going to a love motel in hopes to snatch a quick signature and leave.  However, the situation takes a dark turn when the guy takes what he is owed by force.
response.title: Boasting about multi-level marketing, but then said, “I’ll buy it, so let me sleep with you,” Her face was like… huh?
